so sometimes i follow knitting patterns and sometimes i make my own! and if i make my own they tend to have some relation to other parts of my life (my work)! and if i do that they'll probably end up on here if i think they're cool! i also dye yarn with botanicals from time to time! will share that here too. for all other knitting-related things, you may find me on [instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fiberf4g/)...
